name: Air Cargo CO2 Track And Trace
description: Track your Air Cargo shipments and measure CO2 with more than 190 airlines

api_methods.name: PULL (track)
api_methods.description:
By providing a valid AWB, you can get tracking information for the shipment.

Answers are 10s in average. However, it takes between 1s to 5min to get the information from the airline system but the API has to answer in 30s which generating timeouts errors.
In such case, you have to build the logic to try again 10mins after a timeout to avoid this or to use the subscription method.

utterances.utterance: Can you track the shipment with AWB number 123-45678901?
What’s the status of the air cargo with AWB 987-65432109?
Please track the shipment using AWB number 456-78901234.
Could you check the tracking details for AWB 321-09876543?
I need the tracking information for AWB number 654-32109876.
Track the air cargo shipment with AWB 789-01234567.
What’s the latest update on the shipment with AWB 234-56789012?
Can you provide the tracking status for AWB 890-12345678?
Please track the air cargo with AWB number 567-89012345.
I’d like to know the tracking details for AWB 345-67890123.

api_methods.name: PUSH (unsubscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL and AWB to unsubscribe from receiving tracking updates.

Discontinue the tracking notifications for my shipment.
Stop notifying me about the status of my air cargo.
Unsubscribe me from the tracking service for my air cargo.
I want to stop receiving updates for my air cargo shipment.
Please cancel the tracking updates for my air cargo.

api_methods.name: PUSH (subscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL, AWB and/or email(s), you can receive tracking event updates automatically when they're available.

utterances.utterance: Subscribe me to receive updates for my air cargo shipment.
I want to get notified about the tracking events for my air cargo.
Please send me automatic updates for my air cargo shipment.
Can I subscribe to receive tracking updates for my air cargo?
Notify me when there are updates on my air cargo shipment.
I’d like to be subscribed to air cargo tracking event notifications.
Set up automatic tracking updates for my air cargo shipment.
How can I get real-time updates for my air cargo shipment?
Subscribe me to air cargo tracking updates.
I need to receive automatic notifications for my air cargo tracking events.
